title: How to Make Ringli or Doughnuts

steps.headline: Using a mixer cream the eggs, sugar and shortening until light.
Combine the flour, baking powder and salt in a separate bowl.
Add the flour mixture to the egg mixture alternately with the milk.
Stir together until a soft dough forms.
Add the spices and mix well.
Remove the chilled dough from the refrigerator.
Lightly dust the pastry cloth and rolling pin stocking.
Roll the dough out about 1/3 to 1/2-inch thick.
Cut out doughnuts using a doughnut cutter.
Fry doughnuts in hot oil, between 370 to 380 °F (188 to 193 °C).
Place fried doughnuts on white paper towels to drain.
Roll in sugar or cinnamon sugar while warm.

tyn: Rolling pin, rolling pin stocking and pastry cloth.
text: Using a mixer cream the eggs, sugar and shortening until light.  Combine the flour, baking powder and salt in a separate bowl.  Add the flour mixture to the egg mixture alternately with the milk.  Stir together until a soft dough forms.  Add the spices and mix well.  Chill the dough for 2 hours.  Remove the chilled dough from the refrigerator.  Lightly dust the pastry cloth and rolling pin stocking.  Roll the dough out about 1/3 to 1/2-inch thick.  Cut out doughnuts using a doughnut cutter.  Fry doughnuts in hot oil, between 370 to 380 °F (188 to 193 °C).  Place fried doughnuts on white paper towels to drain.  Roll in sugar or cinnamon sugar while warm.  Finished.
sentences: Using a mixer cream the eggs, sugar and shortening until light.
Combine the flour, baking powder and salt in a separate bowl.
Add the flour mixture to the egg mixture alternately with the milk.
Stir together until a soft dough forms.
Add the spices and mix well.
Remove the chilled dough from the refrigerator.
Lightly dust the pastry cloth and rolling pin stocking.
Roll the dough out about 1/3 to 1/2-inch thick.
Cut out doughnuts using a doughnut cutter.
Fry doughnuts in hot oil, between 370 to 380 °F (188 to 193 °C).
Place fried doughnuts on white paper towels to drain.
Roll in sugar or cinnamon sugar while warm.
